mapper.insert: insert into db_product_daily (SEQUENCEID, YYYY, YYYYMM, YYYYMMDD, ALLSAVENUM, ALLCOST, FIELD1, FIELD2, FIELD3, CATEGORYID) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yyyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yyyymm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yyyymmdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allsavenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{allcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{field1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{field2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{field3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_product_daily set YYYY = #{yyyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YYYYMM = #{yyyymm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YYYYMMDD = #{yyyymmdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALLSAVENUM = #{allsavenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ALLCOST = #{allcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FIELD1 = #{field1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIELD2 = #{field2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIELD3 = #{field3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGORYID = #{categoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, YYYY, YYYYMM, YYYYMMDD, ALLSAVENUM, ALLCOST, FIELD1, FIELD2, FIELD3, CATEGORYID from db_product_daily where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, YYYY, YYYYMM, YYYYMMDD, ALLSAVENUM, ALLCOST, FIELD1, FIELD2, FIELD3, CATEGORYID from db_product_daily
